name: Revenant 2 REMAKE
description:
Story 1

You are Rebecca Wylde, a 19-year-old that's searching for her missing parents. Her brother, who disappeared looking for their parents, was last spotted at an old asylum, just outside Downfall city, that has been overrun by horrific experiments.

Story 2

You are L, a 16-year-old that is being experimented on as he is the only one who is immune to ExE's virus, Blucus Virus. The lab, under an old asylum, has been overrun by experiments. You must find a way out.
